images.prompt: Create a clean, modern illustration for a software engineering talk titled "Agentic IDE — Rules, Commands, Skills". Visualize three labeled pillars (Rules, Commands, Skills) supporting a simplified IDE window. Minimal, high-contrast, flat vector style, dark-mode friendly, no tiny text, no brand logos.

Create a simple diagram-style illustration titled "Rules" showing guardrails around a code editor: a central code file with subtle boundary lines and checkmarks. Flat vector, minimal, high-contrast, dark-mode friendly, no brand logos, no tiny text.

Create a simple workflow illustration titled "Commands" showing a slash command triggering a three-step loop: Plan → Implement → Verify. Flat vector, minimal, high-contrast, dark-mode friendly, no brand logos, no tiny text.

Create a simple illustration titled "Skills" showing a reusable playbook binder or recipe card stack labeled "Skill" feeding into consistent outputs (docs, diffs). Flat vector, minimal, high-contrast, dark-mode friendly, no brand logos, no tiny text.
